not having or not protected by insurance (= an agreement in which you pay a company money and they pay your costs if you become ill or have an accident or injury, or if something is damaged): The plan has provided health insurance for many Americans who were previously uninsured. In court, he admitted driving an uninsured, untaxed car. uninsured drivers Related word
